mapper.select: select tbl_exchange.mno,tbl_exchange.ono,tbl_exchange.pno,tbl_exchange.eno,exCategory,exContent,tbl_exchange.exStatus,exDate,exEndDate, tbl_product.pName,tbl_orderItem.iDisPrice,tbl_orderItem.iCount,tbl_orderItem.iTotalPrice from tbl_exchange left outer join tbl_product on tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_product.pno left outer join tbl_orderItem on tbl_exchange.ono = tbl_orderItem.ono and tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_orderItem.pno where tbl_exchange.mno=#{mno} order by tbl_exchange.exDate

select tbl_exchange.mno,tbl_exchange.ono,tbl_exchange.pno,tbl_exchange.eno,exCategory,exContent,tbl_exchange.exStatus,exDate,exEndDate, tbl_product.pName,tbl_orderItem.iDisPrice,tbl_orderItem.iCount,tbl_orderItem.iTotalPrice from tbl_exchange left outer join tbl_product on tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_product.pno left outer join tbl_orderItem on tbl_exchange.ono = tbl_orderItem.ono and tbl_exchange.pno = tbl_orderItem.pno where tbl_exchange.eno=#{eno}
